game.name: The Lost Edge
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: You live in a small village where everything goes as usual. You went to a workers' village on business, but upon arrival, something went wrong…
game.shortDescriptionEn: You live in a small village where everything goes as usual. You went to a workers' village on business, but upon arrival, something went wrong…
